solution_line_template: The first three cash prizes sum to ${first_place_prize} + ${second_place_prize} + ${third_place_prize}= ${<<{first_place_prize}+{second_place_prize}+{third_place_prize}={sum_first_three_prizes}>>}{sum_first_three_prizes}

The remaining amount of cash prizes to be distributed is ${total_prize_money} - ${sum_first_three_prizes}= ${<<{total_prize_money}-{sum_first_three_prizes}={remaining_prize_money}>>}{remaining_prize_money}
The number of novels left to be awarded is {total_novels_awarded} - {num_top_prizes}= <<{total_novels_awarded}-{num_top_prizes}={remaining_novels_to_award}>>{remaining_novels_to_award} novels

So each writer from 4th to 18th will earn ${remaining_prize_money} / {remaining_novels_to_award}= ${<<{remaining_prize_money}/{remaining_novels_to_award}={prize_per_writer_fourth_onwards}>>}{prize_per_writer_fourth_onwards}
